text: tumhen is dhokhe mein na daale (ki un par aazaab na hoga) in ke pahale nooh kee qaum ne aur un ke baad aur ummaton ne (apane paigambaron ko) jhuthalaaya aur har ummat ne apane paigambaron ke baare mein yahee thaan liya ki unhen giraphtaar kar (ke qatl kar daalen) aur behooda baaton kee aad pakad kar ladane lagen - taaki usake zarie se haq baat ko ukhaad phenken to mainne, unhen giraphtaar kar liya phir dekha ki un par (mera azaab kaisa (sakht hua)
